body: The reason why I named my version of this `insertConstant` is because `create*` functions usually only create nodes, but don't really append them to the graph. I'd rather avoid confusion there
body_html: The reason why I named my version of this insertConstant is because create* functions usually only create nodes, but don't really append them to the graph. I'd rather avoid confusion there
